trans-unit.source: Retrieves the position of the mouse pointer at the time a file was dropped during a drag-and-drop operation

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the position of the mouse pointer at the time a file was dropped during a drag-and-drop operation

target.mrk: Retrieves the position of the mouse pointer at the time a file was dropped during a drag-and-drop operation

trans-unit.source: Handle of the drop structure that describes the dropped file. This parameter is passed to WM_DROPFILES message with WPARAM parameter.

seg-source.mrk: Handle of the drop structure that describes the dropped file.
This parameter is passed to WM_DROPFILES message with WPARAM parameter.

target.mrk: Handle of the drop structure that describes the dropped file.
This parameter is passed to WM_DROPFILES message with WPARAM parameter.

trans-unit.source: $tagPOINT structure that contains the coordinates of the mouse pointer at the time the file was dropped.

seg-source.mrk: $tagPOINT structure that contains the coordinates of the mouse pointer at the time the file was dropped.

target.mrk: $tagPOINT structure that contains the coordinates of the mouse pointer at the time the file was dropped.
